about_the_game:
Overview:
There is a place where it helps to process what we have lost in our life. There is a place where new special guests always arrive and leave. There is a place where it helps to let go of the past and you start to live future. This is Mourning Inc! Do you help Mourning Inc.? Will you be the caregiver of Mourning Inc.?

This is the Chapter 1 of Mourning Inc. which is a 3D Visual Novel with interactions and rich stories. The mourners are only female characters from all over the world. The mourners gradually come to the Mourning Inc from chapter to chapter.
Learn their stories and help them process their mourning!

There is a lot of potential in the game and if you support my work they can be realized.

Features:
- Adventure based gameplay, be the exclusive caregiver of the Mourning Inc.!

- Fully 3D world and characters

- Dialogue choices and branching events,

- Excitements and curiosities

Adult Contents:
- Nudity
- 3D animations

Comment:

ATTENTION! Unity can cause possibly surprise bugs even after hundreds of tests. I'm sorry.

It's a ONE-DEVELOPER fantasy adult game. I dreamed this game and I created a unique world. You can message me on Steam Community or on my Discord Channel, if you have any suggestions/wishes or bugs.

content_descriptors.notes: There aren't sexual abuse, drug and alcohol abuse or self-harm.

name: Mourning Inc.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
